column4: So i keep having web browsers just up and disapear on me, any clue why?
usualy happens when clicking a link or right clicking an image and clicking save
Has happened in FF3, FF2, Epiphany, you name it
gin: why does it just disapear on me....seems random since it also happened when clicking a link
gin: not that I was aware of
just google and then the image in another tab
shouldn't happen at all lol
Im trying to parade Linux as the pinnacle of stability but cant when this happpens lol
also was odd how it has happened in ever browser i have tried, randomly
lol IE7 would be worse yet
it's in the conical repo's
not activated by default?
no
Ok just a check box?
yep
*canonical
under Software Sources->Ubuntu Software (Tab) I have everything checked alrdy including Canonical-supported
it's under the 3rd party tab
archive.canonical.com/
I see that hehe, do i need the source code one too?
nope
opera's in there
